    Steve's (Non-Academic) Cover Letter Template

    cover_letter.Rd

    A template for cover letters when applying for non-academic jobs. For more information, see here: https://twitter.com/stevenvmiller/status/1320831949469065218. This template will force the use of xelatex.

    Usage

    cover_letter(...)

templ_cover_letter()

    Arguments

    ...

    Arguments to rmarkdown::pdf_document.

    About YAML header fields

    This section documents some of the YAML fields to know for this template.

    FIELDDESCRIPTION
    authorname of the author
    addressthe author's address, which can (and should) be piped with | separators
    emailthe author's email
    urlthe author's website domain
    phonethe author's phone number
    fontawesomelogical, defaults to TRUE. If TRUE, use fontawesome icons
    mainfontThe main font to use with xelatex. I use cochineal here. Optional, but recommended.
    monofontThe monospaced font to use with xelatex. I use Fira Code here. Optional, but recommended.
    dateSpecify a date format
    greetingsSpecify a salutations to start the letter
